table.title: Module configuration parameters
table.description: Basic module configuration parameters and flags

display_field.title: Display field
display_field.description: Module display field to use in links to records of this module.

alias.title: Module alias
alias.description: A different user-friendly name for the current module.

searchable.title: Searchable
searchable.description: Whether or not the module is searchable.

typeahead_fields.title: Type-ahead fields
typeahead_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to use for searching in type-ahead lookups

lookup_fields.title: Lookup fields
lookup_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to use in the URL for locating module record

redirect.title: Redirect behavior configuration
redirect.description: Definition of where to redirect upon creation/modification/deletion of module records

hide_associations.title: List of hidden associations
hide_associations.description: Defines a list of associations that should be displayed
